titleStmt.title: The righteous mans plea to true happinesse In ten sermons, on Psal. 4 ver. 6. Preached by Iohn Stoughton Doctor in Divinity, sometimes fellow of Emanuell Colledge in Cambridge, late preacher of Aldermanbury, London.
titleStmt.author: Stoughton, John, d. 1639.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Tho. Cotes [, Richard Badger, and the assigns of Thomas Purfoot], for Iohn Bellamie, H. Overton, A. Crooke, I. Rothwell, I. Crooke, R. Sergier, D. Freere, and R. Smith,

notesStmt.note: Signatures: pi² (*)⁴ 2*⁴ 3A-3R⁴ 4A-4M⁴ 4N² 4O-4T⁴. "Cotes pr[inted]. through Rrr; Badger Aaaa-Nnnn; and Purfoot's assigns Oooo-Tttt"--STC.
The title page is in two settings: first line of imprint ends (1) "H." or (2) "Bellamie".
Reproduction of the original in the Union Theological Seminary (New York, N.Y.). Library.
Some print faded and show-through; some pages stained.
